content: It’s no exaggeration to say that you’re spoiled for choice in the Florida Keys. As an Oceans Edge guest, you can fill your days with the many activities that are included with your stay, while our concierge services are second to none. They can book the best fishing charters, snorkeling and diving adventures, and historical tours, among many other experiences. Whether you want to reel in the biggest tarpon or spend an afternoon with six-toed cats, we’ll help you plan an exceptional stay.
